text: Shadow Puppets (2002), by Orson Scott Card, is the sequel to Shadow of the Hegemon and the third book in the Ender's Shadow series (often called the Bean Quartet). It was first going to be called Shadow of Death.Orson Scott Card, Shadow of the Hegemon (Tor Books, 2000). Pgs 447-448. . ==References== Category:2002 books Category:Ender's Game (novel series)
title: Shadow Puppets
